Interface Environment

public interface Environment

An environment where the agent operates in.

Version:
(a version number or a date)
Author:
Ilkka Kokkarinen

Method Summary
abstract  int runEpisode(boolean simulated)
          Tells the environment to run a single episode.
abstract  void setAgent(Agent agent)
          Sets the agent that operates in this environment.
 

Method Detail

runEpisode

int runEpisode(boolean simulated)
Tells the environment to run a single episode.

Parameters:
simulated - Whether this episode is simulated, that is, does not count towards agent's total score.

Sets the agent that operates in this environment.
